name: Intelligent Cubes
description:
Important: For some unknown bug, sometimes all cubes disappear at the beginning of the scenario. In that case, just hit escape to return to the main menu and retry. I am sorry for your inconvenience!

CONTROLS:

  • Escape - End the scenario and go to main menu
  • Spacebar - jump a little
  • I (= capital i) - enable mouse following
  • J - explode
  • H - swap position (when having 2 spheres)
  • K - Slow down the motion

Note: Not all controls are available in every scenario

Your goal: Enjoy the simulation! Just explore what is possible and play with  intelligent cubes

Developer notes:

  • This game was created in Unity DOTS, which I learned how to use during the game jam.
  • Game jam's topic is: First contact with unknown intelligence
  •  Sounds are downloaded from:

https://freesound.org/people/Gerent/sounds/558742/

https://freesound.org/people/Romariogrande/sounds/396231/
